蘿北.definition: Luobei county in Hegang 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang

蘿北縣.definition: Luobei county in Hegang 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang

蘿艻.definition: old variant of 羅勒|罗勒[luo2 le4]

蘿莉控.definition: lolicon or rorikon (Japanese loanword); manga or anime genre depicting young girls in an erotic manner

蘿蔔.definition: radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. daikon; CL:個|个[ge4],根[gen1]

蘿蔔快了不洗泥.pinyin: luo2 bo5 kuai4 le5 bu4 xi3 ni2
蘿蔔快了不洗泥.definition: when radishes are selling fast, one doesn't take the time to wash the soil off them (idiom); fig. when business is booming, merchants tend to offer goods of inferior quality

蘿蔔白菜，各有所愛.pinyin: luo2 bo5 - bai2 cai4 , ge4 you3 suo3 ai4
蘿蔔白菜，各有所愛.definition: (saying) one man's meat is another man's poison; to each his own

蘿蔔糕.definition: radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")

蘿蔔青菜，各有所愛.pinyin: luo2 bo5 qing1 cai4 , ge4 you3 suo3 ai4
蘿蔔青菜，各有所愛.definition: see 蘿蔔白菜，各有所愛|萝卜白菜，各有所爱[luo2 bo5 bai2 cai4 , ge4 you3 suo3 ai4]
